page.title: 06TOURISM
page.content: One of the attractions of Camber is the Silver Sands Caravan Park, only one minute from the shore and its lovely long sands. It is operated by the Fleet family. There are sites for 200 permanent and touring caravans. All the permanent sites are wired for electric light. The site has a club house and bar,self service cafe,take away,gift shop,supermarket,childrens play area, 20 chalets and a camping site.The site is open from March to late October. The holiday atmosphere is delightful. All the caravans have their own cooking facilities but it is possible to have well served meals till latew in the evening, either in the cafe or to take away. The staff re all helpful and try to mske everyone's holidsy trouble free and happy.
